name: holiday_challenge
description: This is a reference material for the 'blog_api_3' project I am currently working on. I am seriously brain-rusty at the moment! And so I need to make reference to my previous work, as I work on the 'blog_api_3' project. In addition, I will be experimenting with the reference material as well. Hence the need for this repo, since I don't want to tamper with the original repo. I copied this repo, locally on my laptop, from the 'holiday_challenge' repo on my laptop and renamed it 'reference_repo'. Also, I deleted the '.git' directory, initialized an empty Git repo for it.
author: Emmanuel Eni <eejeba@gmail.com>
